item.title: Sarah McLachlan - The Sound That Love Makes - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song The Sound That Love Makes by Sarah McLachlan from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, C, Cmaj7, D, Dm, Dm7, E7, E7♯5, G7, G7sus2, G♯+.

item.title: Sarah McLachlan - When She Loved Me - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song When She Loved Me by Sarah McLachlan from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, A7, Am, A♭m, B♭, B♭7, B♭m, B♭m6, C, C7, Cm, Csus4, Dm, Em7♭5, E♭, E♭m, F7, Fm6, G7, Gdim7, Gm7.
